name: Wall ass office simulator
description:
A phenomenon called wall buttocks, in which a body gets stuck in a wall, happened to Ms. Uzuki, an office worker at her co-worker's office.

The protagonist, who has just come across it, attempts to get Ms. Uzuki out of the wall butt.

The breasts, buttocks, anus, and genitals can be touched intuitively with mouse clicks.
The rubbing method changes step by step, so you can experience a tangible and direct reaction.

You can purchase items by accumulating hearts through touching to advance the game more efficiently.

If the girl has been in a wall-butt position for a long time, fatigue will accumulate, and items can be used to help her.

The game experience is enhanced with rich animations.
Changes in facial expressions may directly affect the player's senses.

It provides a feeling as if you are really playing wall butt.

By clicking, the pleasure, dependence, fatigue, and urination bars rise.
The game is over when each bar is fully extended.
The game is over when any of the bars (pleasure, dependence, fatigue, and urination) reach their maximum.

The rate of growth of the pleasure and other bars varies depending on the method of touch you click on.
Clicking on (or rubbing) breasts, for example, increases pleasure and dependence, but since Uzuki is not good at touching anus Clicking (rubbing or anal beads) the anus lowers pleasure and dependence.

The values increase and decrease with clicks. There are 5 types of rubs for breasts, buttocks, and genitals, and 3 types of rubs for anus.
The rubs are unlocked as the dependency level increases.
The rising and falling values change with each rub.

Clicking on a breast will cause the breast bar to rise.
As the bar rises, the rubbing will automatically become more extreme. When the bar reaches its maximum value
The mood of the player will decrease. When the mood goes down, the game is over.

There are four places to click: breasts, buttocks, genitals, and anus.

For example, the chest rubs.
The higher the dependence, the lower it unlocks.
This is followed by a five-step change in the value of the breast bar.

The key is to increase the dependency to increase the number of rubs.
You can gradually raise the dependence by clicking, but it is also possible to raise it to some extent by using items.
Making full use of items also plays a very important part.

Hearts are acquired by clicking. The number of hearts you get is indicated by a bar on your chest or other parts of your body that rises when you click.
The rate of increase changes the number of hearts acquired from 1 to 5.

The game is over when one of the following bars exceeds the maximum value: low mood, pleasure, dependence, fatigue, or urination,
The number of acquired hearts does not decrease even if the game is over (multiple endings).
